main event: On September 8, 1961, a disc-shaped unidentified flying object was observed hovering near Sandusky, Ohio, emitting a bluish-white light.
interesting points: The object changed color from reddish to white while burning, hovering for about a minute before disappearing rapidly., The sighting duration was approximately 5-10 minutes, as reported by multiple witnesses., One witness, Mrs. Martin, noted the object was yellowish-orange and took a photograph that was not yet developed., Clear weather conditions were present at the time of the sighting, with visibility of 15 miles., The observation was made both visually and with one lost photograph due to the object's rapid movement.
witness description: Mrs. Martin and Mr. Sinnett observed the object from their homes in Sandusky.
